thread.title: SHARE: 2015 Corn mazes, pumpkin patches and haunted houses in the Ozarks
thread.title_full: SHARE: 2015 Corn mazes, pumpkin patches and haunted houses in the Ozarks

title: SHARE: 2015 Corn mazes, pumpkin patches and haunted houses in the Ozarks
text:
Campbell's Maze Daze (Nixa), September 20-November 2, 2014 : Facebook 
The Ozarks is known for it's beautiful fall foliage. More from KY3 SHARE: Schedule of fall festivals and crafts shows in... 
Enjoy the fall colors and the abundance of corn mazes and pumpkin patches. Some are haunted and some are kid friendly. Whatever you choose you're bound to have fun. So grab the kiddos and hop in the car to go get lost one of the many mazes, patches, and haunted houses the Ozarks have to offer. Keep in mind many of the mazes donate some of their money to different charities or back to their community. 
We divided everything up by county to make it easier to find one near you. Most have Facebook and websites with times and dates. Just click on the link to find out more. 
*Please keep in mind most of these events occur on the weekends only. This list is just intended to be a time-frame guide. Also, this is list is long please notice there are multiple pages and you may need to hit "next" to see your county. 
If we missed any please e-mail rfoster@ky3.com and we'll get your event on the list, we don't want to leave anyone out. 
Also check out our link with area fall harvest and craft shows. Click Here 
Barry County Exeter corn maze, September 19- October 31, 2015 : details
